sense.gloss: being served food outside the meditation hall (at a Zen temple)
dining with one's superior, dining with one's superiors
sitting with one's superior, in attendance
riding in the same carriage (car) (with a superior), attending on (one's superior) in the same carriage
viewing something in the company of one's superior
ceremony performed by a sorcerer to protect a noble setting out on a trip
dance steps inspired by this ceremony
serving food (to a nobleman), nobleman's server
subsidiary burial mound (Kofun period), satellite burial mound

sdata.j: ↑今朝↑↓けさ↓、↑陪審↑↓ばいしん↓の↑件↑↓けん↓で↑呼↑↓よ↓ばれて↑陪審↑↓ばいしん↓↑員↑↓いん↓をやることになったんだ。
sdata.e: I was called in for jury this morning, and I actually have to serve on a case.

sdata.j: ↑陪審↑↓ばいしん↓↑員↑↓いん↓たちは↑被告↑↓ひこく↓の↑年齢↑↓ねんれい↓を↑考慮↑↓こうりょ↓するよう↑求↑↓もと↓められた。
sdata.e: The jury were asked to allow for the age of the accused.

sdata.j: ↑陪審↑↓ばいしん↓↑員↑↓いん↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑無罪↑↓むざい↓とした。
sdata.e: The jury acquitted him of the crime.

sdata.j: ↑陪審↑↓ばいしん↓↑員↑↓いん↓は↑未決↑↓みけつ↓のままだ。
↑陪審↑↓ばいしん↓↑員↑↓いん↓は↑有罪↑↓ゆうざい↓の↑判決↑↓はんけつ↓を↑答申↑↓とうしん↓した。
sdata.e: The jury has returned a verdict of guilty.

sdata.j: ↑陪審↑↓ばいしん↓↑団↑↓だん↓による↑有罪↑↓ゆうざい↓↑評決↑↓ひょうけつ↓が↑大↑↓だい↓↑論争↑↓ろんそう↓の↑引↑↓ひ↓き↑金↑↓がね↓となった。
sdata.e: The jury's guilty verdict gave rise to widespread debate.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑陪審↑↓ばいしん↓↑員↑↓いん↓として↑登録↑↓とうろく↓した。
sdata.e: They enrolled him as a jury member.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑法廷↑↓ほうてい↓に↑判事↑↓はんじ↓と↑陪審↑↓ばいしん↓↑員↑↓いん↓の↑前↑↓まえ↓にたった。
sdata.e: She stood in the court before judge and jury.

sdata.j: ↑陪審↑↓ばいしん↓↑員↑↓いん↓は↑有罪↑↓ゆうざい↓の↑評決↑↓ひょうけつ↓を↑出↑↓だ↓した。
sdata.e: The jury has returned a verdict of guilty.
